<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3115</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No15:Eli Weisel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - No15:Eli Weisel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - No15:Eli Weisel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No15:Eli Weisel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No15:Eli Weisel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - No15:Eli Weisel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No15:Eli Weisel</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading assignment of a an article about Eli Weisel, where they are required to answer a deep question based ona quotation of Eli Weisel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Lektüre von ein Artikel über 
Eli Weisel, in dem sie benoetigt werden, um eine tiefe Frage 
gegründete ona Preisangabe von Eli Weisel zu beantworten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une attribution de lecture d'un article 
concernant Eli Weisel, où elles sont exigées pour répondre à une 
citation de la ARO basée par question profonde d'Eli Weisel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição de leitura do um artigo 
sobre Eli Weisel, onde são requeridos para responder pergunta 
profunda a uma citação baseada do ona de Eli Weisel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione di lettura dell'un 
articolo su Eli Weisel, dove sono richieste per rispondere ad una 
citazione di ona basata domanda profonda di Eli Weisel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση ανάγνωσης ένα άρθρο για 
Eli Weisel, όπου πρέπει για να απαντήσουν σε μια βαθιά 
βασισμένη στην ερώτηση αναφορά ona Eli Weisel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una asignación de lectura del un 
artículo acerca de Eli Weisel, donde se requieren para contestar a 
una cita basada pregunta profunda del ona de Eli Weisel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ολοκαύτωμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eli Weisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
